scripts.setup: npm run setup:dittnav && npm run setup:vta && npm run setup:registrering && npm i
scripts.refresh:dittnav: cd layouts/dittnav && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.refresh:vta: cd podlets/vta && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.refresh:registrering: cd podlets/vta-registrering && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:layout" "npm run start:vta" "npm run start:registrering"
scripts.refresh: concurrently "rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i" "npm run refresh:dittnav" "npm run refresh:vta" "npm run refresh:registrering"
